thread.title: MusicNews | Adele writes open letter to fans updating them on her new 'make-up' album, '25'
thread.title_full: MusicNews | Adele writes open letter to fans updating them on her new 'make-up' album, '25' - entertainment.ie

author: Lauren Murphy
title: MusicNews | Adele writes open letter to fans updating them on her new 'make-up' album, '25'
text:
With rumours swirling about Adele's forthcoming third album - which is due for release next month, if reports are to be believed - the singer has broken her silence on the matter to reveal a little more about what to expect from the follow-up to '21'.
Taking to Twitter to post a note about the album's theme, she described '21' as a 'break-up record'. 'If I had to label this one, it'd be a make-up record, " she explained. "I'm making up with myself. Making up for lost time. Making up for everything I ever did and never did.'
She went on to say that turning 25 two years ago was "a turning point" for her and the new album sees her moving on without the emotional baggage of her past.
So, in other words, it seems like the album is definitely called '25 ', although she didn't confirm a release date.
Read the full note below:
